channel.title: Thr on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Thr on RD's Blog

item.title: Regulation of the ABC Kinases by Phosphorylation: Protein Kinase C as a Paradigm
item.description: A landmark review on the ordered, site-specific phosphorylation events governing the maturation, activation, and regulation of ABC kinases — using PKC as a paradigm — with profound insights into kinase life cycles, structural stabilization, and multi-step control mechanisms.
